item.title: ‘King of the Hill’ Showrunner on Writing Hank Hill for a Different Era
item.description: Saladin K. Patterson talks to The Hollywood Reporter about how he kept the revival’s sense of humor and characters true to the original, and writing for a Disney-owned streamer about a present-day Tex
